name: SleepaceAroma
0:
”Alexa, open Nox Aroma”
”Alexa, ask Nox Aroma to turn on the light”
”Alexa, ask Nox Aroma to change the light color to red”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nox aroma
des:
Voice control for your Nox Aroma just got more intuitive. Alexa now includes light, Sleep-Aid, alarm control. Here are some of our favorite phrase to get started：

Light Control：
-You can turn Nox Aroma on/off, for example“Alexa, ask Nox Aroma to turn on/off the light”or “Alexa, open Nox Aroma and turn on/off the light”
-You can change the brightness, for example “Alexa, ask Nox Aroma to turn up/down the light”or “Alexa, ask Nox Aroma brightness 10%（1%~100%）”
-You can change the color, for example “Alexa, ask Nox Aroma to change the light color to red”or “Alexa, tell Nox Aroma that I want red color”,try asking Alexa for “White”, “Red”, “Orange”, “Yellow”, “Green”,“Cyan”, “Blue”and “Purple”

Aroma Control:
-You can turn on/off aroma, for example “Alexa, ask Nox Aroma to turn on/off the aroma”or “Alexa, ask Nox Aroma to switch on the aroma”

Alarm:
-You can turn on/off the Alarm, for example “Alexa, ask Nox Aroma to turn off the alarm ” or “Alexa, tell Nox Aroma to stop the alarm”

How to Get Start？
1.Download Sleepace App in AppStore or GooglePlay and create a Sleepace account
2.Connect Nox Aroma to your Sleepace account
3.Enable the skill by clicking on the “Enable” button and log in to your Sleepace account
4.Say something to get start
